item.title: Exploring Kyoto’s Beautiful Past
item.description: Kyoto was once the Imperial Capital of Japan for more than 1000 years and is known as the ‘City of Ten Thousand Shrines’. Kyoto is as traditional as it gets; here you will find ancient temples, majestic gardens, traditional ceremonies and geisha. There is plenty to see here and depending on which season you visit you’re guaranteed to see some wonderful scenery. At first I didn’t want to leave Tokyo, but after we arrived in Kyoto I welcomed the laid back atmosphere.
